body_html: The script seems to only write from local_rank == 0: https://github.com/diux-dev/imagenet18/blob/59a8f25171fb8cede51db9187a32fc8f802384a0/training/train_imagenet_nv.py#L150 so unless I misunderstand how rank works it should be OK.
